item.title: Aziatix - Cold
item.description:
(Why you being so cold
why you being so cold)
Sitting
by the phone
‘Til six
in the morning
I’m waiting
baby
I’m trying
to figure out
What the hell’s
going on
With you
lately
What you got
to say girl
(So tell me)what’s
gotten into you girl
(Can’t you see)
not gonna
Hold me
down tonight
(We can’t be)
baby no more
So whatever you say
to me
You won’t get the best
of me yeah
Why you being so cold
what you want me to be
Girl it’s only a dream
it’ll never be so
Why do you
go on
Playing these games
on me
We could never be
‘cuz baby
You’re so cold
you’re so cold
In the burning cold
she left me for dead
What’s left is
froze
Shatter my heart
and soul to pieces
Whatever that’s
left is gone
Who was once
my queen’s
Now out
my dreams
Gucci shades
watching her leave
Brushing off the dirt
next to me
New start so fresh
and clean clean
(So tell me)what’s
gotten into you girl
(Can’t you see)
not gonna
Hold me
down tonight
(We can’t be)
baby no more
So whatever you say
to me
You won’t get the best
of me so tell me
Why you being so cold
what you want me to be
Girl it’s only a dream
it’ll never be so
Why do you
go on
Playing these games
on me
We could never be
‘cuz baby
You’re so cold
you’re so cold
When’s the stars
aligned
And the tides were
high
When the sky above
the clouds turned gray
I was there for you
but I always knew
Like a breeze
girl you’d go away
She comes off pure
for sure
Fresh from the garden
daybreak
She gets me
started
Then I card it
feel the cold chill
When she rides up
on it
Damn really
if the kid
Ever had a chance
to go back
I rather
move on
I just hope
you know that
Get the picture
Kodak
Next train to destiny
I’m on that
Why you being so cold
what you want me to be
Girl it’s only a dream
it’ll never be so
Why do you
go on
Playing these games
on me
We could never be
‘cuz baby
You’re so cold
(you’re so cold)
You’re so cold
(you’re so cold yeah)
Why you being so cold
what you want me to be
Girl it’s only a dream
it’ll never be so
Why do you
go on
Playing these games
on me
We could never be
‘cuz baby
You’re so cold
you’re so cold

item.title: Aziatix - Go
item.description:
Don’t have the words
to say
But baby I’m
goin’ away
Took another road
ahead
And I’ll be
so far away
Gonna fly to where
my water’s sky blue
Martini Margaritas
on the beach
And now’s the time
to party
The night
through
Not you girl
no one but me
It was nice
to greet ya
And it was nice
to meet ya
But I know that
I’m off the hook
I’m fishing
for another keeper
I’ll delete ya
never reach ya
Girl I’m done
with putting you on on
Never call you again
cuz I’m gone
With the wind
for the kid
It’s time
to move on on
Baby I don’t mean
to be cliche
But it’s not you girl
but me
Still got
a lot of player
Left
in me
So I’ll be
on my way
Babe I gotta go go
baby roll
Adios
and I’m out the door

baby roll

you no more

far away
Babe I’m goin’
far far away

adios

it was before

far away

for me
To let you know
I’m gone

to a set
Where I don’t need
nothing planned and
Party it up
with all I can
With all my will
with all I am
Sometimes lovers
need a holiday
And that’s
just the way it is
I see the stars
aligned
We’re ready to go
show you
That the world is
ready for me

baby roll

and I’m out the door

through

That’s right
it’s time for me to

and it ain’t
